alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Iron; Price; Sawyer; Washburn (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 6:14PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL IRON, EAST CENTRAL WASHBURN, SOUTHERN ASHLAND AND CENTRAL SAWYER COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM CDT... At 613 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles south of Upson, to near Glidden, to near Clam Lake, to near Chippewa Flowage West, to near Stone Lake, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Glidden around 620 PM CDT. Butternut around 635 PM CDT. Mercer around 645 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Reserve, Northwoods Beach, Chief Lake, Lac Courte Oreilles Reservation, Grindstone Lake, Teal Lake, Island Lake Iron County, Fisher Lake, Loretta and Morse. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. These storms may intensify. Monitor local NOAA Weather Radio, commercial radio, or television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for Price County in north central Wisconsin.
